title: Munster rise to second in URC win against Ospreys

summary: Relegation from the Premier League looks inevitable for Wolves after a 15th defeat in 17 games - but will they avoid setting more unwanted records?

summary: The pre-match pyrotechnics at Hampden Park brought colour and noise, but there was a distinct lack of fireworks when Glasgow and Edinburgh faced off.

summary: Jake Paul's jaw is broken in two places by Anthony Joshua during their heavyweight fight in Miami.
